import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' const modal = { position : "fixed" , transform : "translate(-50% , -50%)" , top : "50%" , left : "50%" , backgroundColor : "white" , height : "500" , width : "400px" , zIndex : 1000 } export default function Modal({open , data , onClose}) { console.log(data); if(!open) return null return ReactDOM.createPortal( <>

{data.title}

{}

, document.getElementById('portal') ) }
